Получить данные для графиков

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"habitId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"period","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["week","month","year"],"default":"month"},"description":"Период для графика."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Массив точек данных.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Точка данных для графика прогресса.","required":["date","completions","pomodoros","intensity"],"properties":{"date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Дата.","example":"2025-11-01"},"completions":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Количество выполнений.","example":1},"pomodoros":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Количество pomodoro.","example":1},"intensity":{"type":"integer","description":"Уровень интенсивности выполнения (0–4).","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"example":2,"title":"IntensityLevel"}},"title":"HabitChartData"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
